<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>For net new CSM Customers in Paris:
1. CSP Pre-Chat survey - Active
2. CSP Anonymous pre-chat survey - Active
3. Service Portal Agent Chat Configurations - Active
4. csp.legacy_chat - Inactive</description>
        <name>Pre-chat configuration</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var wf = gs.getSession().getWorkflow();
gs.getSession().setWorkflow(true);

var preChatConfig = "05c6860853d50010717cddeeff7b1297, b978c60853d50010717cddeeff7b125f";
var agentChatConfigSysId = "fbcbce8853d50010717cddeeff7b123d";
var legacyChatProperty = "2969964053190010717cddeeff7b12d1";

if (!pm.isUpgradeSystemBusy()) {
	//Enable the CSP Pre-Chat Surveys
	var chatSurvey = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_survey");
	chatSurvey.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", preChatConfig); 
	chatSurvey.query();
	while(chatSurvey.next()){
		chatSurvey.setValue("active", true);
		chatSurvey.update();
	}
	
	//Enable agentChat
	var agentChatConfig = new GlideRecord("sp_agent_chat_config");
	if(agentChatConfig.get(agentChatConfigSysId)){
		agentChatConfig.setValue("active", true);
		agentChatConfig.update();
	}
	
	gs.setProperty("csp.legacy_chat", false);
}

gs.getSession().setWorkflow(wf);

]]></script>
